data.text:
This particular volume is for all ages from the time a child is reading fluently through high school, and covers the time period beginning where “Land That I Love” leaves off, at the American Revolution, through World War I

Description

This particular volume is for all ages from the time a child is reading fluently through high school, and covers the time period beginning where “Land That I Love” leaves off, at the American Revolution, through World War I. With engaging weekly stories, researching, vocabulary, writing, and timeline creation, history comes to life through many different avenues.
